english.segment1: Two hands on the wheel of my fate. Sweat running down my forehead. Cars passing me like we're in a race. I don't know what danger lies ahead
english.segment2: Cause I'm just a student driver. And I need your help to guide me. Cause on my own I'm nothing
english.segment3: Looks like the road ahead might be rough to take. Oh no, I've spun out of control. Good thing my passenger has a brake. And he knows exactly where to go
english.segment4: Cause I'm just a student driver. And I need your help to guide me. Cause on my own I'm nothing
english.segment5: Now my right wheel is wobbling off. And my stereo is blown. But because I'm a student driver. This car is not my own
english.segment6: Cause I'm just a student driver. And I need your help to guide me. Cause on my own I'm nothing
english.segment7: Cause I'm just a student driver. And I need your help to guide me. Cause on my own I'm nothing
english.segment8: Cause I'm just a student driver. And I need your help to guide me. Cause on my own I'm nothing
